data.text: @PickleMrs So dumb. I don’t understand why a loud, obnoxious group of people can just take over the school districts? Intimidation works. 😡😡🤬🤬
@breethemidwife There is absolutely zero way this isn't going to be a horrifying mistake. They're calling it "easing restrictions" but in reality they're just pulling almost ALL of them.
@PickleMrs My step-daughter just told us they are lifting all mask mandates AND no longer requiring any close contact isolation. It’s so horrifying.
@ImLaurieS It's the Cons pushing this for their base

@PickleMrs It’s very similar to what our schools’ mitigation is.
Do you have a small vocal obnoxious group with a HO to mirror the premature mitigation removal policies in the US?

@NorthernGirl_20 5 only has his first shot so far, only got it a couple weeks ago. Bussing will go down once even more drivers get sick. My mom is a bus driver, 69 year old cancer survivor and diabetic. These politicians don't give a fuck
@PickleMrs Same on my kids school board. I’m so disappointed and disheartened.

@PickleMrs I have no idea either. We're doing it in the states too. I was wearing a mask out the other day and someone looked at me like I was an alien lol. It's so surreal. One day everyone was just like "we're done" like a switch was flipped

@MaxWibby That's just it, what the hell do they think is going to happen? They have a hard enough time keeping bus drivers right now due to Covid, but this won't make it worse? They're not even offering online learning if you lose your bus now
@PickleMrs It's super premature imo and I suspect we'll have to drag it all back. That will reduce compliance, make ppl mad and just confuse people.
